experience.title: Freelance Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to the core API managing lab reports for patients and practitioners. Designed and implemented a granular report access scope system, enabling compatibility with multiple recipients and varying permission levels.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description:
Led the Growth team to improve practitioner and patient experiences. Managed full project lifecycles from design to deployment while mentoring juniors. Key projects:
- Overhauled the dashboard search system to allow real-time searching and granular filtering.
- Implemented manual appointment creation, decoupling the process from the automated worklist.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to the Engine team on the core inventory arbitration network using Rust full-time. Worked autonomously on new features, maintenance, and performance optimization for both code and database. Integrated new e-commerce platforms into the modular connector system.

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description:
Lead Software Engineer in the Scale & Growth team. Focused on improving platform availability, reliability, and performance. Managed project lifecycles from specification to implementation while mentoring juniors. Key achievements:
- Implemented asynchronous messaging between microservices to enhance reliability and performance.
- Overhauled the billing microservice.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Member of the Core team responsible for a legacy C/C++ codebase. Led refactoring efforts towards modern C++ to provide robust interfaces and libraries, significantly improving developer productivity and system reliability company-wide.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Enhanced the automated moderation platform to detect fraudulent and undesirable submissions in a high-volume, high-frequency environment. Developed and maintained the back-office interface for system configuration. Implemented and optimized machine learning algorithms, establishing automated testing frameworks to evaluate and ensure performance.

experience.title: R&D Engineer
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a new high-performance search engine for arbitrarily structured data. Designed, implemented, and optimized the query language responsible for requesting, aggregating, and compiling data, meeting strict performance and versatility requirements.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Implemented, optimized, and evaluated novel tractography algorithms for brain MRI data based on cutting-edge research papers.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Overhauled the data processing workflow to drastically reduce tractography computation time for high-resolution MRI data from new generation machines.

education.details:
Major in SCIA (Cognitive Sciences and Advanced Computing): Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Text Mining, Image Processing, AI.
Strong focus on C, C++, and Unix systems.
Member of the ACU (Assistants C/Unix) and YAKA teams: Taught C, C++, Java, Unix basics, and higher-level concepts. Designed courses, exams, and projects, and maintained student software/hardware infrastructure. Led the migration from SVN to Git.
